tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,Prenatal Checkup,
review: I consulted vasudha ma'am for my pregnancy and delivery. For the first time I walked into her clinic frankly with least expectation but i felt most comfortable throughout the 9 months of pregnancy and delivery and today finally I'm utmost satisfied. She has that magic of healing with smile and creating comfortable atmosphere. I have a kind of phobia with doctors, hospitals, injections etc. But I opted for C section and I had  confidence that she can handle it smoothly and she did it as I expected. Toady I no longer have that phobia. Thank u doctor for everything.
reply_text: Thank you Mamatha for your kind words . Hope you are doing fine. 👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
She was very professional. I was uncomfortable before entering her office, but she talked to me very sweetly, which helped a lot.
She took a good long time to understand my problem + give a good explanation of my issue. She was very patient with my doubts and my questions. She later even made conversation and asked where I work and where I'm from etc, which also helped me ease up a bit. :)
Highly recommended!
reply_text: Thanks Madhulika! I really appreciate your feedback:)

review:
Very humble person, explains the process in a simple way, make us feel at ease and very hearty person. Quick to respond to our queries over phone. 
We consulted her for our firstborn now consulting for second baby. Thanks dr for helping us through this process, glad we found you. Wish u lot of joy and good health for bringing more joy in couples life. -Aarthi

A very gentle and kind Doctor. Dr. Vasudha Shekhar is blessed with patience and all the knowledge she needs to have be it me. Very accurate on what she says or prescribed. Never asked me to do any unnecessary scans or blood tests. Her million dollars smile will heal you without medication.
Most amazing , most genuine and most comfortable doctor. Let ur happy moments start with Dr. Vasudha Shekhar.
